name: Legend Summoners
description:
A unique 2D RPG strategy game. Use your strategy skills to create the best heroes and armies to defeat your opponents in epic multiplayer war games. Lead your army into epic battles to gain equipments, coins and gems. For successful combat, upgrade your heroes, equip powerful equipments for your heroes and armies. Fights against other player, defence against epic world boss, party boss.

- Collect powerful heroes
- Build up your ultimate armies
- Train powerful heroes
- Master the strategy
- Dominate epic battles
